name: Falling In Reverse
description:
Falling In Reverse is a fun 2D platformer that was inspired by the likes of Jump King and Metroid. 

You are an astronaut and unfortunately your ship crashed and left you stranded at the bottom of a crater on an unknown planet. Not to worry though, your robot companion IV4N is here to keep you company.

Jump up and explore this new area as you try to find a way to escape, but be prepared for some turns along the way!
